name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files - The Complete First Season

reviews.name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files - The Complete First Season
reviews.reviewText: I haven't seen this series in a long time now. I got my homies to watch it with me and it seems like a Pizza Marathon for Yu Yu Hakusho lol. I can't wait to see season 2.

reviews.name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files - The Complete First Season
reviews.reviewText:
It reminds when I was 15 I love this anima
it's worth buying
reviews.title: 07 April 2011

reviews.name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files - The Complete First Season
reviews.reviewText: who wouldn't want to watch an anime that starts off with the main character is dead. that action and fun just continue from there.
reviews.title: a punk who can fight

reviews.name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files - The Complete First Season
reviews.reviewText: great packaging, great anime, movie love to see all over again.
reviews.title: 06 April 2011

reviews.name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files - The Complete First Season
reviews.reviewText:
I loved Yu Yu Hakusho growing up and when I found the anime here at walmart.com I was soo excited. I bought the first season for my little cousin for christmas. Hes only 6 and he LOVES it. I still enjoy watching it too, and he loves that we watch it together.
I already have ordered the second and third season for him, and will order the fourth once he gets his allowance back up
reviews.title: Totally Satified
